result.arabic_text: فَعَمِيَتۡ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلۡأَنۢبَآءُ يَوۡمَئِذٖ فَهُمۡ لَا يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
result.translation: Basi zitawapotea khabari siku hiyo, nao hawataulizana.
result.footnotes: Khabari hizo zikawapita hawazitambui kama kwamba ni vipofu. Ikawa hapana amuulizae mwenziwe, kwani wote walikuwa sawa sawa wameshindwa kujibu.
